#Q.NO.2

```{r}
mat.a <- matrix(
c(4, 5, 7, 8, 0, 9, 5, 4, 8),
nrow = 3,
ncol = 3,
byrow = TRUE)
mat.a

#transpose
mat.a.transpose = t(mat.a)

mat.a.transpose


#create new matrix (mat.b)
mat.b <- matrix(
c(14, 52, 75, 89, 10, 91, 51, 44, 28),
nrow = 3,
ncol = 3,
byrow = TRUE)
mat.b

#Addition
sum <- mat.a + mat.b
print(sum)

#Subtraction
sub <- mat.a - mat.b
print(sub)

#Multiplication
prod <- mat.a*mat.b
print(prod)

  
```

```{r}
vector.1 = c(1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13)

vector.1
vector.2

vector.1 + vector.2
vector.1 - vector.2
vector.1 * vector.2
vector.1 / vector.2

cbind(vector.1, vector.2)
rbind(vector.1, vector.2)

as.numeric(vector.1)
as.numeric(vector.2)

as.character(vector.1)
as.character(vector.2)
```
